msgSnippet: ... I ve never said any such thing. I ve said unreachable code should be deleted. Merely untested code should be tested. -- ﻿Elliotte Rusty Harold

James Abley wrote:

> Playing devil's advocate to some extent here, I'm surprised at this. I read 
> your developerworks article about cobertura, but you've made some reasonably 
> dogmatic statements on this list about deleting any code that doesn't have a 
> test 

I've never said any such thing. I've said unreachable code should be 
deleted. Merely untested code should be tested.

--
